sentences.en: "I was very unsure of myself after the divorce," she says, unconsciously sweeping back the curls from her forehead.
sentences.cn: “离婚之后我变得非常不自信，”她边说边不自主地把额前的卷发往后捋了捋。

sentences.en: Almost unconsciously she dressed in harmony with this note of simplicity.
sentences.cn: 她简直不自觉的打扮得跟这朴素的调子很调和.

sentences.en: Because I'm weak, my brain got confused, and I screamed unconsciously.
sentences.cn: 因为我软弱无力, 我的脑子糊涂了, 我就不知不觉地叫起来.

sentences.en: Even a man like Victor Henry, Slote thought in despair, had unconsciously blocked out the story.
sentences.cn: 斯鲁特心里感到绝望, 甚至象维克多·亨利这样的人也视而不见地把这段新闻忽略了.

sentences.en: Even the doctor, shy but no fool, half unconsciously acknowledged the compliment.
sentences.cn: 甚至医生本人, 虽然有些腼腆,却并不愚蠢, 也有一星半点儿意识到这种礼遇.

sentences.en: He unconsciously switched a tree with his cane when he talked to her.
sentences.cn: 在和她讲话时，他无意识地用手里的鞭子抽打着一棵树。

sentences.en: Her poor clothes were neat, and she held her head unconsciously in a dainty way.
sentences.cn: 她的衣服虽然普通却很齐整, 她的头不自觉地微微扬起,显出天然的风韵.

sentences.en: I think racism is unconsciously inherent in practically everyone.
sentences.cn: 我认为种族偏见固有地存在于几乎所有人的潜意识中。

sentences.en: It was uncanny, this rising sea in a dead calm, and their voices unconsciously sank lower.
sentences.cn: 海面在从容不迫地上涨,使得他们毛骨悚然, 他们不由自主地压低了嗓门.

sentences.en: She unconsciously moved back a pace or two.
sentences.cn: 她下意识地向后退了一两步.

sentences.en: The dedication lay on top and handy ( laughter ), so by and by I unconsciously stole it.
sentences.cn: 那献词浮在最上面,信手就可拈来 ( 笑声 ), 于是不知不觉地,我就把它偷来了.

sentences.en: The most ridiculous grimaces were purposely or unconsciously indulged in.
sentences.cn: 故意或者无心地扮出最滑稽可笑的鬼脸.

sentences.en: The question is:Do I wish to walk this path consciously, or unconsciously?
sentences.cn: 问题是：我是希望有意识地走这条路，还是无意识地走这条路？

sentences.en: To the unconsciously indelicate person, all things are delicate.
sentences.cn: 在有伤大雅而自己并不觉得的人看来, 什么事情都是无伤大雅的.

sentences.en: Unconsciously he had longed for the days before his marriage.
sentences.cn: 不知不觉地他倒怀念起结婚前的日子来了.

sentences.en: Unconsciously we copy those we are close to or love or admire.
sentences.cn: 我们自觉、不自觉地模仿着我们所亲近、爱戴或敬仰的人.

sentences.en: Where Euclid unconsciously assumed the infinitude of straight lines.
sentences.cn: 欧几里得不自觉地假定了直线的无限性.

words.tran_cn: 无意识的；失去知觉的；不省人事的；未发觉的
无意识；意识不清；[医] 人事不省

trans.tran_cn: 未意识到地，不知道地，失去知觉地，神志不清地
